resources.string: This is a short quiz on safety at work and at home. Go ahead and test your knowledge about basic safety.
- Each correct answer is worth 2 score points.
1. When using the stairs, the best practice is to ...
2. The number you dial in case of something very important is called a/an
3. Which TWO of the following are hazardous in the workplace?
4. What should be done when the floor is to be mopped?
5. The best way to keep pens and pencils on a desk is to...
Select two correct answers here or forfeit all marks.
Hang a notice away from the area to be mopped
Create a barrier around the area and include a note with the reason
Drizzle the floor with water and leave the area unattended to
Put in a holder with tips pointing up
Leave them lying flat on the desk
Put in a holder with tips pointing down
You did not enter a name
